caption.p: Cytotoxicity of AECR-AuNPs in breast cancer (MCF-7) cells. Percentage viability of MCF-7 cells was assessed using the MTT assay after 24 and 48 h incubation with increasing concentrations of AECR-AuNPs.
Each data is presented as mean ± SD (n = 3). ap < 0.05 compared to the vehicle control, bp < 0.05 compared to Fulvestrant (0.12 μM).
